XRWebGLBinding.summary: NOTE Experimental The XRWebGLBinding interface is used to create layers that have a GPU backend.

XRWebGLBindingGetSubImage.summary: NOTE Experimental The getSubImage() method of the interface returns a object representing the WebGL texture to render.

XRWebGLBindingGetViewSubImage.summary: NOTE Experimental The getViewSubImage() method of the interface returns a object representing the WebGL texture to render for a view.

XRWebGLBindingGetDepthInformation.summary: NOTE Experimental The getDepthInformation() method of the interface returns an object containing WebGL depth information.

XRWebGLBindingCreateProjectionLayer.summary: NOTE Experimental The createProjectionLayer() method of the interface returns an object which is a layer that fills the entire view of the observer and is refreshed close to the device's native frame rate.

XRWebGLBindingGetReflectionCubeMap.summary: NOTE Experimental The getReflectionCubeMap() method of the interface returns a object containing a reflection cube map texture.

remarks.para: The texture format is specified by the session's reflectionFormat. See the options parameter on and for more details. By default, the srgba8 format is used. When using a rgba16f format, you need to be within a WebGL 2.0 context or enable the extension within WebGL 1.0 contexts.

XRWebGLBindingXRWebGLBinding.summary:
NOTE Experimental The XRWebGLBinding() constructor creates and
returns a new object.

XRWebGLBindingCreateCylinderLayer.summary: NOTE Experimental The createCylinderLayer() method of the interface returns an object, which is a layer that takes up a curved rectangular space in the virtual environment.

XRWebGLBindingCreateCubeLayer.summary: NOTE Experimental The createCubeLayer() method of the interface returns an object, which is a layer that renders directly from a cubemap, and projects it onto the inside faces of a cube.

XRWebGLBindingCreateEquirectLayer.summary: NOTE Experimental The createEquirectLayer() method of the interface returns an object, which is a layer that maps equirectangular coded data onto the inside of a sphere.

XRWebGLBindingNativeProjectionScaleFacto.summary: NOTE Experimental The read-only nativeProjectionScaleFactor property of the interface represents the scaling factor by which the projection layer's resolution is multiplied by to get the native resolution of the WebXR device's frame buffer.
XRWebGLBindingNativeProjectionScaleFacto.value: A floating-point number representing by how much the device's native frame buffer size is scaled by.

XRWebGLBindingCreateQuadLayer.summary: NOTE Experimental The createQuadLayer() method of the interface returns an object which is a layer that takes up a flat rectangular space in the virtual environment.
